section.title: Introduction
section.para: Beginning with Shorewall 4.5.4, Shorewall allows matching packet SOURCE and/or DEST IP addresses by their corresponding country. That is done by specifying a comma-separated list of ISO-3661 2-character Country Codes prefixed by a caret ('^').
Example - Drop email from the Anonymous Proxy and Satellite Provider networks.
section.programlisting: #ACTION SOURCE DEST PROTO DEST # PORT(S) DROP:info net:^A1,A2 dmz tcp 25
section.para: The country codes recognized by Shorewall as of Shorewall 4.5.4 are shown in the following two sections.
